sentences.en: A Brazier had a little Dog, which was awith his master, and his constant companion.
sentences.cn: 有个黄铜匠养了一只小狗, 小狗是他的宠物, 也是他的忠实伙伴.

sentences.en: CPI special - purpose SMT backflow brazier lubricating oil. textile stereotypia machine stretching machine chain link oil.
sentences.cn: CPI专用SMT回流焊炉润滑油. 纺织定型机拉幅机链条油.

sentences.en: He leaped over the corpse as if it had been a burning brazier.
sentences.cn: 他跨过尸体,好象那是能把他吞噬的一只火炉.

sentences.en: I'm afraid of the cold. I even had the charcoal brazier on today.
sentences.cn: 我是怕冷的, 今天还生着炭盆.

sentences.en: If Brazier effect occurs on a stalk, it will bend after 25 % to 30 % of flexion.
sentences.cn: 发生Brazier屈曲的茎在危险截面的屈曲程度为25%～30%时达到临界弯距,此后进入屈曲.

sentences.en: She also makes a fire at the ceremony at Beijing Paralympic Game to hold the brazier.
sentences.cn: 她还在北京残奥会的取火仪式上捧起火盆.

sentences.en: Winter comes, people like around next to the brazier for heating.
sentences.cn: 冬天来临时, 人们喜欢围在火盆旁边取暖.

trans.tran_en: a metal container that holds a fire and is used to keep people warm outside
